backend/main.mo: Defines user profile, mood, gender, and relationship intent types with text converters inside an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs for copy, mood analysis, and UI behavior changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global app structure with AuthGate and ProfileGate.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Renders the sticky app header with branding, journal button, and user menu including profile and logout options.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Wraps the main app layout with header, bottom nav, outlet content, and journal overlay providers.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar with active state detection and unread notification badges.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button that opens the compose page when visible based on journal visibility context.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps children with authentication, showing a loading screen or login panel when needed.
Renders the login UI with random copy, status messages, and a button to trigger Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a generated summary of circle energy based on provided status posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Shows current circle members with profile info and allows removing members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form to join a circle by entering a share code and sending a join request.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Lists incoming join requests with profile info and actions to accept or decline.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays and allows editing or copying the user's share code.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Shows a reminder card prompting the user to log a mood, with dismiss and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Button-triggered popover calendar for selecting a journal entry date.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Displays journal entries for a selected date with support for adding, saving, and deleting entries when editing is allowed.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Wraps the journal UI in a slide-in panel with date selection and an entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes historical mood data, shows trends, distribution, and top moods over a selected timeframe.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Blocks app access until the user profile is loaded and triggers onboarding if no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides users through multi-step profile creation and saves the completed profile.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Lets users select predefined or custom context tags with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Provides searchable, categorized mood options and returns the selected mood.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Shows a prompt asking whether the user wants to write a private journal note after posting a status.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Renders a status card showing author info, mood details, content, and audience count with identity-based badges.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Provides predefined context tags plus configuration limits for tagging.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Exports the core promise and boundary text defining the app’s purpose and limits.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains rotating emotional login screen phrases and a helper to pick a random one.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories for mood selection.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Context for controlling visibility of a floating journal component with show/hide methods.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Context managing journal overlay state, including open/close and reset behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and methods using Internet Identity, managing login, identity loading, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Hooks for querying, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's mood history from feed data within a timeframe, returning sorted mood entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for profiles, share codes, join requests, circle data, statuses, and notifications using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with safe‑area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the circle dashboard with energy, members, join requests, and share code management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Page for composing and submitting a status update with mood, audience, and context tags.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the user's feed with status cards, refresh controls, and mood reminder logic.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows unread and read notifications with marking‑as‑read and navigation to related status updates.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editor page that loads the caller's profile, supports editing fields, and saves updates via mutation hooks with validation and UI state handling.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status post with loading/error handling and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Utility functions for calculating age, formatting DOB for inputs, and parsing date strings into bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Generates a soft sentiment summary for recent status posts by filtering recent posts, categorizing moods, determining vibe, and selecting seeded phrases.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Validates and normalizes custom context tags, checking length, emptiness, and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Analyzes mood patterns to compute distributions, dominant mood, trends, concern level, and guidance with a safety disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Manages once-per-day mood reminder visibility using localStorage keyed by local date.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric share code using a restricted, user-friendly character set.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Time utilities for converting between bigint timestamps and Date, checking date boundaries, and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing or persisting them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s version, overall app summary, and a list of existing implemented features with IDs and descriptions.
